channel.title: BBC Nitro programmes feed - scifi
channel.description: Unofficial BBC iPlayer feeds via the Nitro API

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 6 : Daventree Mansions - Episode 4
item.description: Having acquired copper silver and gold, Pilgrim returns to Jacksons Mill where his friend Morgan and the spirit Hartley have prepared a nasty surprise.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 6 : Ouldmeadow Jack - Episode 3
item.description: Still in search of gold to rescue those trapped in Hartley's mine Pilgrim comes to Ouldmeadow where he helps an old friend make a final river trip.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 6 : St Lewin - Episode 2
item.description: In search of silver and gold, Pilgrim comes to St Lewin where the malevolence of a powerful old enemy is causing havoc in the lives of ordinary people.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 6 : Jackson's Mill - Episode 1
item.description: 4 Extra Debut. Pilgrim discovers that an old friend is being haunted by a malevolent spirit. Meanwhile, homeless people are disappearing from a local shelter.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 5 : Parsons Mount - Episode 4
item.description: Pilgrim's quest for the Radiant Boy forces him to travel to the one place he has been forbidden to go. Starring Paul Hilton and James Fleet.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 5 : Woolmere Walter - Episode 3
item.description: Pilgrim is forced to assist an odd couple in their very unusual courtship. Starring Paul Hilton and Michelle Terry.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 5 : Gallowstone Hill - Episode 2
item.description: In search of the Radiant Boy, Pilgrim comes to a village cursed with a dangerous collective madness. Starring Paul Hilton amd Lee Ross.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 5 : Lyall Park - Episode 1
item.description: 4 Extra Debut. The immortal wanderer William Palmer comes to Lyall Park where he uncovers an astonishing and disturbing family secret.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 4 : Bleaker Lake - Episode 4
item.description: Pilgrim hopes to find an end, at least to the war of attrition with Birdie, at best to his own immortality. Starring Paul Hilton and Kate Fleetwood.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 4 : Wedlowe Sound - Episode 3
item.description: Pilgrim must tackle an old adversary and save the community of Wedlowe Sound when it is threatened by a giant. Starring Paul Hilton and Ronald Pickup.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 4 : Tregarrah Head - Episode 2
item.description: Pilgrim has to rescue the Old Man of Tregarrah Head from his fate as the changeling baby of devoted parents. Starring Paul Hilton and Rebekah Staton.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 4 : Mullerby Fair - Episode 1
item.description:
By Sebastian Baczkiewicz
Episode 1: Mullerby Fair
The first story in a new series featuring the immortal William Palmer. In an attempt to settle an age old dispute, Pilgrim must confront the ruthless Mr Speed, but he has a secret weapon.
Directed by Marc Beeby
A fourth series of four thrillingly dark adventures. Pilgrim, cursed with immortality by the King of the Greyfolk, is forever forced to walk between the human world and the world of Faerie in a never-ending quest to preserve the uneasy balance between the two. In this series, armed with the Abaeron, a book of incredibly powerful magic that protects its owner above all else, he can finally challenge Mr Speed who has stolen generations of brides from one family, separate devoted parents from their very strange new changeling baby, put a giant to sleep, and locate Merlin, the figure most feared in all the Faerie world. Hard tasks at the best of times, but Pilgrim must also contend with the relentless malice of the sorceress Mrs Pleasance and the devious cunning of the King of the Greyfolk himself.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 3 : Lindie Island - Episode 4
item.description:
By Sebastian Baczkiewicz.
4 of 4: In exchange for a precious bargaining chip in his negotiations with the King, Pilgrim is asked to sacrifice a man he has kept safe for centuries.
William Palmer ..... Paul Hilton Viv ..... Pamela Merrick Henselow ..... Adam Billington Marcellus ..... Jimmy Akingbola Goat Lord ..... Nicky Henson Randell ..... Carl Prekopp Birdie ..... Kate Fleetwood
Directed by Jessica Dromgoole.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 3 : Aisley Bridge - Episode 3
item.description:
By Sebastian Baczkiewicz.
3 of 4: Following the mysterious absence of a local girl, Pilgrim is drawn into the strange world of the lanes, and the immortal children who live there.
William Palmer ..... Paul Hilton Lily ..... Victoria Inez-Hardy Mr Hendrickson ..... James Lailey George ..... Kasper Hilton-Hille Effie ..... Nishi Malde Cecilia ..... Faye Castelow Audrey ..... Lizzy Watts Everett ..... Simon Bubb Conor ..... Adam Billington
Directed by Jessica Dromgoole.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 3 : Sookey Hill - Episode 2
item.description:
By Sebastian Baczkiewicz.
2 of 4
When Pilgrim investigates a story about a man being turned into a hare, he meets a dangerous new enemy. The second in a new series of dark fantasy adventures.
CAST
William Palmer ..... Paul Hilton Colonel Coburn ..... Ralph Ineson Birdie ..... Kate Fleetwood Barry ..... Carl Prekopp Nathan ..... Gerard McDermott Mary ..... Alex Tregear Dale ..... Simon Bubb
Directed by Marc Beeby.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 3 : Crowsfall Wood - Episode 1
item.description:
By Sebastian Baczkiewicz.
1 of 4
Pilgrim is called upon to help an old friend who is possessed by a deadly forest spirit . The first of four new dark fantasy adventures featuring the immortal William Palmer.
CAST William Palmer ..... Paul Hilton Tadek ..... Karl Johnson Cecilia ..... Faye Castelow Ewa ..... Susan Engel Macadam ..... Dudley Sutton Cripps ..... John Rowe Henselow ..... Adam Billington Grainger ..... Rikki Lawton
Directed by Marc Beeby
This is the third series of enormously popular adventures to feature cult hero William Palmer - the Pilgrim of the title.
In 1185, William Palmer was making pilgrimage to Canterbury. Unbeknownst to him his fellow pilgrim was the King of the Greyfolk. When William claimed that the Church would wipe out the belief in the Faerie world, he was cursed by the Faerie King and condemned forever to the walk between our world and theirs.
The plays in PILGRIM are thrilling, dark and contemporary. They're set in a very recognisable, very real present, but a present haunted by the folktales of these islands: forest spirits, changeling children, Merlin...

item.title: James Follett - Devil To Pay - 28/01/2016
item.description: A car crash on a hot deserted road. A camper on hand to drag the driver from the wreckage. What's the story? Stars Derek Seaton.

item.title: No Point Talking - 28/01/2016
item.description:
Award-winning sci-fi writer Geoff Ryman's new story for the BBC, imagining a future world where California has been split in two, each half with very different political outlooks.
His conservative hero finds himself in a place he doesn't like or understand, where everything he holds dear is challenged: relations between men and women, and even the very definitions of 'he' and 'her'.
This story was written as Geoff was investigating the portrayal of gender in utopian science fiction, as part of BBC Radio 4's Utopia season. That documentary which accompanies 'No Point Talking' is called 'Herland'.

item.title: Neil Gaiman - Neverwhere : The Key - Episode 6
item.description:
Beneath the streets of London there is another London. A subterranean labyrinth of sewers and abandoned tube stations. A somewhere that is Neverwhere.
An act of kindness sees Richard Mayhew catapulted from his ordinary life into a subterranean world under the streets of London. Stopping to help an injured girl on a London street, Richard is thrust from his workaday existence into the strange world of London Below.
So begins a curious and mysterious adventure deep beneath the streets of London, a London of shadows where the tube cry of 'Mind the Gap' takes on new meaning; for the inhabitants of this murky domain are those who have fallen through the gaps in society, the dispossessed, the homeless. Here Richard meets the Earl of Earl's Court, Old Bailey and Hammersmith, faces a life-threatening ordeal at the hands of the Black Friars, comes face to face with Great Beast of London, and encounters an Angel. Called Islington.
Joining the mysterious girl named Door and her companions, the Marquis de Carabas and the bodyguard, Hunter, Richard embarks on an extraordinary quest to escape from the clutches of the fiendish assassins Croup and Vandemar and to discover who ordered them to murder her family. All the while trying to work out how to get back to his old life in London Above.
A six part adaption of Neil Gaiman's novel adapted by Dirk Maggs, sees James McAvoy as Richard lead a stellar cast which includes Natalie Dormer, David Harewood, Sophie Okonedo, Benedict Cumberbatch, Christopher Lee, Anthony Head, David Schofield, Bernard Cribbins, Romola Garai, George Harris, Andrew Sachs, Lucy Cohu, Johnny Vegas, Paul Chequer, Don Gilet and Abdul Salis.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 2 : Hope Springs - Episode 4
item.description: The roaming immortal reunites with daughter Doris, but learns an old foe is on his trail. Stars Paul Hilton.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 2 : The Lady in the Lake - Episode 3
item.description: The ageless wanderer is drawn to the case of a magical fiddle player, and finds a tragic love triangle. Stars Paul Hilton.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 2 : The Lost Hotel - Episode 2
item.description: The mystical, timeless man tracks a missing person and finds himself an unwilling guest at a sinister hotel. Stars Paul Hilton.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 2 : The Drowned Church - Episode 1
item.description: The Drowned Church: Humanity's ageless champion returns, this time to stop a sinister church congregation under the sea. Starring Paul Hilton.

item.title: Planet B : Series 3 : The End of the Rogue - Episode 5
item.description:
Episode 5 by Matthew Broughton
The virtual world has been switched off by Mark Schwartz. As the power slowly drains from the circuits, Kip and Medley must race through the ruins of reality in a desperate bid to reset the universe. Is this the end for Planet B? Last in the series.
Kip .. Lloyd Thomas Medley .. Claire Harry Cerberus .. Chris Pavlo Slab .. Tony Bell Deano .. Adeel Akhtar Mary .. Sally Orrock Mark Schwartz .. Sam Dale With Gunner Cauthery, Iain Batchelor, Henry Devas and Adjoa Andoh.
Directed by James Robinson.

item.title: Planet B : Series 3 : Disaster! - Episode 4
item.description: In the last hours of Planet B, what is better than a farewell party? Virtual reality saga by Matthew Wilkie. Stars Lloyd Thomas.

item.title: Planet B : Series 3 : Doing Time - Episode 3
item.description: Held in the world's toughest jail, can Kip escape prison brutality? Virtual reality saga by Nick Perry. Stars Lloyd Thomas.

item.title: Planet B : Series 3 : The Pirate Islands - Episode 2
item.description: Medley and Kip must battle island inhabitants to save Planet B. Virtual reality saga by Penelope Skinner. Stars Claire Harry.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 1 : 'Gainst All Disaster - Episode 4
item.description: Mankind's immortal hero is forced to help Joseph of Arimethea - held captive by a very malevolent angel. Stars Paul Hilton.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 1 : No Foes Shall Stay His Might - Episode 3
item.description: Aided by a powerful spirit, a hunter is after Pilgrim - who tries to save himself by rescuing a young girl. Stars Paul Hilton.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 1 : Then Fancies Flee Away - Episode 2
item.description: Mankind's hero is forced to help a young lad who has lain in a coma, surrounded by thorns, for seven years. Stars Paul Hilton.

item.title: Pilgrim - Sebastian Baczkiewicz : Series 1 : He Who Would Valiant Be - Episode 1
item.description: A dragon's egg must be retrieved by a hero cursed with immortality - between the worlds of faerie and man. Stars Paul Hilton.

item.title: Wally K Daly : 625Y : Episode 2 - Episode 2
item.description: Scientist Kate Brown's attempt to bring her new gene discovery into the public domain doesn't go to plan. Stars Amanda Root and Geoffrey Whitehead.

item.title: Terry Pratchett : Only You Can Save Mankind : Episode 3 - Episode 3
item.description: Johnny has the flu and just wants to go to bed, but the ScreeWee Captain is still in trouble. Terry Pratchett's sci-fi adventure with Tim Smith.

item.title: The Laxian Key : Episode 4 - Episode 4
item.description: Evans the Welsh vigilante aims to senselessly bomb the planetary decontaminationists for melting Earth. Stars Chris Larner.

item.title: Ghost Zone : Episode 5 - Episode 5
item.description: In a thrilling conclusion, the army closes in on Inchbrae, but can the alien presence be defeated? Stars Gayanne Potter.

item.title: Ghost Zone : Episode 4 - Episode 4
item.description: The alien's purpose in Inchbrae becomes apparent when Jill and Beth witness more moments from the past. Stars Gayanne Potter.

item.title: Ghost Zone : Episode 3 - Episode 3
item.description: Elizabeth begins to work out what has happened to Inchbrae, but becomes the focus of a hostile presence. Stars Joanna Tope.

item.title: Ghost Zone : Episode 2 - Episode 2
item.description: The advance party receives a hostile reception from the bizarre occupants of the village. Stars Sandy Neilson.

item.title: Wally K Daly : 625Y : Episode 1 - Episode 1
item.description: A scientist discovers a gene that could determine a man or woman's natural lifespan. Stars Amanda Root and Geoffrey Whitehead.

item.title: Terry Pratchett : Only You Can Save Mankind : Episode 2 - Episode 2
item.description: The ScreeWee Captain asks Johnny to lead them, but the gunnery officer has other ideas. Terry Pratchett's sci-fi drama with Tim Smith.

item.title: Terry Pratchett : Only You Can Save Mankind : Episode 1 - Episode 1
item.description:
As the alien fleet crosses the computer screen, 12 year old Johnny prepares to blow the ScreeWee into a million pieces - sparking a wild seesaw adventure involving space warfare, starships and aliens.
Terry Pratchett's sci-fi fantasy stars Tim Smith as Johnny, Janet Dale as ScreeWee Captain, Michael Angelis as the Gunnery Officer, Mark Finn as the PT Teacher, Akhbar Karim as Wobbler and Marian Kemmer as Johnny's Mother.
Dramatised by Bob Hescott. Producer: Brian Lighthill First broadcast on BBC Radio 4 in 1996.
